Title: A Potpourri of Freaks
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Ian Deitchman, Kristin Rusk Robinson, Lowell Ganz (based on the characters created by), Babaloo Mandel (based on the characters created by), Ron Howard (based on the characters created by)
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: Max (Max Burkholder) meets a new friend who means more to him than Kristina (Monica Potter) and Adam (Peter Krause) initially expect. After an awkward run-in with Sandy (Betsy Brandt), ...
